name: Home Security (itch)
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2019! Theme was "What does home mean to you?"

To us, home means comfort. Home means having somewhere to feel safe. But how can one feel safe when spiders, crabs, and fast blue creatures are attacking it? Defend your home with famous home defense systems like Turrets, Molasses, and Boots! Build your home upwards to stop the enemies from reaching your safe space! Press N on the menu for Nightmare Mode
